title: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank reduces net loss at Rs 34 crore - Economic Times
content: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank reduces net loss at Rs 34 crore  Economic Times
description: â€œLast couple of months have been challenging due to internal and external issues, despite that we focussed on business and streamlined processes which lead to improved portfolio quality, higher business volumes and reduced attrition," the bank's new managing director Ittira Davis said.
